channel.title: Just a question, Possessor vs Alchemist Emerald Potion
channel.description:
I was playing as a possessor, and was killed at night. I wasn't told that it bypassed my Black Shield immunity. Later, an alchemist claimed responsibility. Is this something that can actually happen? And if so, is it intended? I wasn't occupied that night, so I wasn't Happy Houred the same night.
Chat log: `You will control Nicolas Vernye [11] and kill Gilbert Atlee [2] tonight.` `Something prevented you from visiting Nicolas Vernye [11]. This could be due to a Court Wizard, Prince, Mercenary, Poacher, Sage, or Sellsword.` `You were attacked last night.`
If this is intended, the wording of emerald potion should be updated.

item.title: Just a question, Possessor vs Alchemist Emerald Potion
item.dc:creator: Floofyboy
item.description:
I’m pretty sure there is a bug with alch. I got killed twice at night as scorned by alchemists.

Read full topic
item.source: Just a question, Possessor vs Alchemist Emerald Potion
